eu.play_project.play_eventadapter

Class AbstractReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.play_project.play_eventadapter.AbstractReceiver

  • public abstract class AbstractReceiver
extends Object
    A an abstract event consumer which can subscribe to PLAY RDF events and deal with the necessary un-marshalling and parsing.
    Author:
    stuehmer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractReceiver()
      Create an AbstractReceiver using the default PLAY DSB endpoints to make subscriptions.
      AbstractReceiver(String dsbSubscribeEndpoint, String dsbUnsubscribeEndpoint)
      Create an AbstractReceiver using the specified PLAY DSB endpoints to make subscriptions.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        public String subscribe(QName topic,
               String notificationsEndPoint)
                 throws org.petalslink.dsb.notification.commons.NotificationException
        Subscribe to a topic at the endpoint in dsbSubscribe. The callback will be used by the DSB to send the subscriptions. It is your responsibility to prevent/avoid duplicate subscriptions if needed.
        Parameters:
        topic -
        notificationsEndPoint - callback SOAP URI to receive notifications
        Throws:
        org.petalslink.dsb.notification.commons.NotificationException

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(String subscriptionId)
                 throws org.petalslink.dsb.notification.commons.NotificationException
        Unsubscribe from a specific subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionId -
        Throws:
        org.petalslink.dsb.notification.commons.NotificationException

      • unsubscribeAll

        public void unsubscribeAll()
        Unsubscribe from all previous subscriptions. Don't fail if something goes wrong.

      • getTopics

        public List<QName> getTopics()
        Retreive the current list of topics from the endpoint in dsbSubscribe.
        Returns:
        the current list of topics
